info.name: dark invert keeping colors
info.description: A super minimal, color true, 20-line inversion & hue-rotation filter scheme, for a very reliable dark theme. keeps images and videos color correct. ...waiting for the others to discover the hue-rotation trick...
info.additionalInfo: Unfortunately, there is no pure-css solution to { background-image: url(''); } case. 2018-03-15: I included a custom YouTube selector though ;) 2018-03-15 u#2: full-screen YouTube now working I use it together with dark devTools for google chrome tags: negative, invert, inverted, black, dark, night, solarize, solarized, minimal, ergonomic, colortrue, hue, video, youtube
